mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart(cid_fk, pnum_fk, pqty) VALUES(#{cid_fk}, #{pnum_fk}, #{pqty})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_cart WHERE cid_fk = #{cid_fk} AND pnum_fk = #{pnum_fk}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_cart SET pqty = #{pqty} WHERE cart_num = #{cart_num}
